title: San Juan National Historic Site: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       The National Park Service makes every effort to keep the public informed about news events, accomplishments, employee recognitions, special and re-occurring events which occur within and around the units of the Park Service. San Juan NHS provides news releases to the local media. Current and past news releases can also be found here on the park web site. For all press inquiries, call (787) 729-6777 or by e-mail at e-mail us
